name: Rambling Man
description:
A simple story-based, procedural, FPS game!

This game is dedicated to two great men, Dickey Betts and Gregg Allman. Their birthday was last week, so I want to dedicate this game to these legends.

12 December 1943 - Nashville, Tennessee. There were two great men on the train, they were playing some song on their guitar! But enemies didn't let them have fun!

In this endless game, you'll try to survive as long as possible. Kill the enemies, earn XP, craft new weapons or enhance your weapons! Nonstop action!

There are 3 weapons you can research and craft. Handgun, auto-rifle and rifle! You need 'em all to survive because the enemies will be more powerful over time.

  • "W, A, S, D" to walk
  • "LEFT CONTROL" to crouch
  • "SPACE" to jump
  • "E" to interact
  • "R" to reload
  • "LEFT CLICK" to fire
  • "RIGHT CLICK" to aim (hint: while you're aiming, crosshair will turn to red if enemy is in weapon's range)
  • "ENTER" to pass the intro cinematic

I think these details are enough, because game has a tutorial :)

Created in 7 days for 7DFPS and PROCJAM.
